ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, Am I the only one that thinks archery is a non paladin like skill ? I for one cant understand why they gave us this covardly backstabbing skill. Nothing
ygData.messageBody:
Hail,

Am I the only one that thinks archery is a non paladin like skill ?
I for one cant understand why they gave us this covardly backstabbing skill.

Nothing is better than a charge into a camp filled with filthy orcs !

/ Njelm, crusader of Kaladim

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevin Byer [SMTP:kbyer@...]
> Sent: den 31 maj 1999 21:01
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Archery
>
> From: Kevin Byer <kbyer@...>
>
> is there a place near freeport that fletchers can get their parts from, its
> a long trip to other cities. I am a budding fletcher(average skill) and I
> hate having to travel every couple of days for materials.
>
> Also what are the pine needles and tiny daggers for?
>
> Aban
>
> On Monday, May 31, 1999 12:53 PM, RangerDest@...
> [SMTP:RangerDest@...] wrote:
> > From: RangerDest@...
> >
> > Ask a fletcher to make a rouge elm bow for you. Mine is 13 dmg 50
> > delay 75 range and I bought it for 5 pp. Most fletchers seem to be in
> Greater
> > Faydark
> >
> > Oh and I talked to GM and he said that since paladins have the
> > archery skill they MIGHT be able to use tiny dagger and pine needles in
> the
> > next patch, but that we should all send Feedbacks to the GMs so that it
> gets
> > on the "list" of things to do. I have already done so and I urge the
> rest of
> > you to do it as well, whether you use a bow or not.
> >
> > -Adaron
> >
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> > http://www.onelist.com

>

> What do lizards and rock music have in common?
